Class Parser

java.lang.Object
  Parser

public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object

This parser reads user input, tokenises it and stores it in an ArrayList. It then compares the elements to a list of strings from a KeyWordList and stores a match as a keyWord. It then returns a Command object consisting of a CommandWord and Keyword.

Version:
1
Author:
162228

Constructor Summary
Parser()
          Create a parser to read from the terminal window and a KeyWords object, keyWordList, to retrieve the appropriate list of keywords for the current roomType.
